title: DOA5 Ultimate
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting â€œSee Game Manual".  Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate brings fighting entertainment to the next level with all-new modes, characters, stages, and more!  Several new playable characters enter the fight, including Momiji and Rachel from the Ninja Gaiden series and Jacky from the Virtua Fighter series. Tons of new modes and features have been introduced, including Team Fight and multiplayer tag modes.   The best in fighting entertainment has just gotten even better!

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Akira Halloween Costume
childDownloads.description: The season is (dead or) alive with the spirit of All Hallows' Eve! Have your own DOA5U Halloween bash with sweet and wicked disguises for each fighter. Please install the latest title update (ver. 1.03 or higher) in order to use this content. This costume is also included in the Trick-or-Treat Set. Get all 28 Halloween costumes in one convenient set for a special price!

childDownloads.title: Ayane DOA5 Costumes
childDownloads.description: Get 8 costumes from DOA5 in one convenient set!  This set includes costumes from the following sets: Player's Swimwear, Hotties Swimwear, Hot Getaway, Uniform, Gym Class, Round 3 Special Costumes, Cheerleader, and Santa's Naughty Girls.  This costume was originally distributed for Dead or Alive 5. Please confirm you do not already own this costume before purchasing.

childDownloads.title: Ayane Nurse Costume
childDownloads.description: In case your opponent needs medical attention after the fight, be ready in this sweet nurse uniform.  This costume is also included in the Nurse Costume 10-Character Set.  Please install the latest title update in order to use this content.

childDownloads.title: Ayane School Uniform
childDownloads.description: The ladies of Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate break the dress code in naughty student and teacher uniforms.  This costume is also included in the School Uniform Pack, which includes all 12 School Uniform costumes at a special price.

childDownloads.title: Ayane Uniform
childDownloads.description: One of the sexiest outfits for one of the hottest fighters in gaming.  This costume was originally distributed for Dead or Alive 5. Please confirm you do not already own this costume before purchasing.

childDownloads.title: Ayane Workout Clothes
